archived.name: Fix command suggestions to use full plugin prefix
archived.description: Update all command suggestions in harness output to use the correct /claude-harness: prefix instead of shorthand /harness-
verification: All command suggestions in commands/*.md use /claude-harness: prefix
start output shows correct command format
feature output shows correct command format
checkpoint output shows correct command format
orchestrate output shows correct command format

archived.name: Shorten plugin command names by removing redundant 'harness-' prefix
archived.description: Rename commands to eliminate redundancy: /claude-harness:harness-* becomes /claude-harness:* (e.g., harness-orchestrate â†’ orchestrate)
verification: All command files in commands/ are renamed (remove harness- prefix)
All internal command references are updated to new naming scheme
Plugin registers commands with shorter names
Commands work correctly after rename
README.md updated with new command names

archived.name: Add working-context.json for session continuity
archived.description: Add working-context.json to capture active working state during /checkpoint, enabling seamless session resumption after context compaction or new sessions
verification: /setup creates empty working-context.json
/checkpoint captures current working state with files, decisions, understanding
/start displays working context prominently at session start
CLAUDE.md instructs reading working-context.json
Session resumption feels like continuation, not cold start

archived.name: Move harness files to dedicated .claude-harness/ directory
archived.description: Refactor setup command to create harness state files in a dedicated .claude-harness/ directory instead of repo root. Includes auto-migration for existing installations.
verification: /setup creates .claude-harness/ directory
All state files created inside .claude-harness/
/start reads from new location
/feature reads/writes to new location
/checkpoint reads/writes to new location
/orchestrate reads/writes to new location
Auto-migration detects root files and moves them
.gitignore template updated for new structure
README.md updated with new file locations
CLAUDE.md updated to reference new paths

archived.name: Agentic Loops
archived.description: Implement persistent agentic loops that continue across context windows until verification passes
verification: /claude-harness:implement command works
Loop state persists across sessions
SessionStart hook shows active loops
Verification gates are mandatory

archived.name: Memory System Utilization
archived.description: Actually implement the 4-layer memory read/write operations in commands (implement, checkpoint, start) that setup.sh creates but are never used
verification: /start compiles working context from memory layers
/start displays 'approaches to avoid' from failure memory
/implement queries failure memory before attempting implementation
/implement records successes to procedural/successes.json
/implement records failures to procedural/failures.json
/checkpoint persists decisions to episodic memory
Memory entries include feature ID for cross-feature queries
Commands reference v3.0 paths (.claude-harness/memory/...)
